## History

- v2.2.0 July 18, 2012
	- Updated for DocPad v6.3.0

- v2.0.2 June 12, 2012
	- Updated for DocPad v6.0.8

- v1.1.0
	- Updated for DocPad v5.3

- v1.0.0 April 14, 2012
	- Updated for DocPad v5.0
